author: Elizabeth Williamson, Elizabeth Williamson
title: Trump administration launches attack on government media group Voice of America
description: White House claims broadcaster used communist government statistics to compare China's coronavirus death toll to America's
content:
The White House lobbed a bizarre broadside against Voice of America (VoA) this week, using one of its popular communications channels to accuse the US-funded foreign news broadcaster of amplifying Chinese propaganda.
The post appeared Thursday on 1600 Daily,… [+2281 chars]
